1.0.2: Add 'groups:read' to the listChannels component to fix 'missing_scope' error.

2.4.1: Add new components: SendDirectMessage and ListUsers.
Add new components: AddReaction, DeleteReaction, ListReactions and GetMessageReactions.

Updated labels in some outPort components.
NewUser: now checks for up to 1000 users
